descriptions.description: XZ Utils is free general-purpose data compression software with high compression ratio. XZ Utils are the successor to LZMA Utils.
XZ Utils ist eine kostenlose Allzweck-Datenkomprimierungs-Software mit hoher Komprimierungsrate. XZ Utils sind die Nachfolger der LZMA Utils.

comments.comment: Homepage: Building the code from the git repository requires GNU Autotools. Here are the minimum versions that should work with XZ Utils; using the latest versions is strongly recommended: Autoconf 2.64, Automake 1.10, gettext 0.18 (Note: autopoint depends on cvs!), libtool 2.2

set.commands:
PACKAGE_NAME=xz PACKAGE_VERSION=5.0.5
oegimport libiconv oegimport gettext oegextract ${PACKAGE_NAME}
configure --prefix=${OEG_BASE_DIR} --with-sysroot=${OEG_BASE_DIR} --with-gnu-ld --disable-rpath --with-libiconv-prefix=${OEG_BASE_DIR} --with-libintl-prefix=${OEG_BASE_DIR} --bindir=${OEG_BASE_BIN_DIR} --libdir=${OEG_BASE_LIB_DIR} ${CONFIGURE_HOST_PARA} make make install-strip DESTDIR=${OEG_INSTALL_DIR} cp -a extra ${OEG_INSTALL_DIR}${OEG_BASE_DIR}/share/doc/xz # copy 7z2lzma.bash and scanlzma.c
make clean configure --prefix=${OEG_BASE_DIR} --with-sysroot=${OEG_BASE_DIR} --with-gnu-ld --disable-rpath --disable-shared --disable-nls --disable-encoders --enable-small --disable-threads ${CONFIGURE_HOST_PARA} make -C src/liblzma make -C src/xzdec # no install, because we don't want to overwrite our existing shared binaries and e.g. the man pages... #make -C src/xzdec DESTDIR=${OEG_INSTALL_DIR} install-strip cp src/xzdec/xzdec.exe ${OEG_INSTALL_DIR}${OEG_BASE_BIN_DIR}/xzdec.static.exe cp src/xzdec/lzmadec.exe ${OEG_INSTALL_DIR}${OEG_BASE_BIN_DIR}/lzmadec.static.exe strip -s ${OEG_INSTALL_DIR}${OEG_BASE_BIN_DIR}/xzdec.static.exe strip -s ${OEG_INSTALL_DIR}${OEG_BASE_BIN_DIR}/lzmadec.static.exe
make clean configure --prefix=${OEG_BASE_DIR} --with-sysroot=${OEG_BASE_DIR} --with-gnu-ld --disable-rpath --disable-shared --disable-nls ${CONFIGURE_HOST_PARA} make -C src/liblzma make -C src/xz cp src/xz/xz.exe ${OEG_INSTALL_DIR}${OEG_BASE_BIN_DIR}/xz.static.exe strip -s ${OEG_INSTALL_DIR}${OEG_BASE_BIN_DIR}/xz.static.exe
cd "${OEG_INSTALL_DIR}${OEG_BASE_DIR}" # The bin directory contains only the required dll, the other files are already in bin64. mv bin/*.dll bin64/ rm -rf bin # TODO: Do we need to edit the .la files in lib64?
oegarchive ${PACKAGE_NAME}-${PACKAGE_VERSION}
